about_the_game:
Atrium Malum - first person sci-fi survival horror. You are one of the last, (or maybe last) crew member. Your mission is to find out what is going on and get out from the spaceship. Will you survive, or not, will depends only on you.

You are an ordinary member of an expedition to explore new worlds. Your responsibilities include the maintenance of subsystems of the ship and maintenance of working equipment. After another expedition to the surface of the nearest planet, you began to notice some oddities in the behavior of electricians. One day you wake up as usual. But there's nothing usual on your ship anymore.

The outcome of this nightmare depends on you. What will you choose?

Key Features

You choose the method of the game and the ways of its walkthrough

You want to live. That's all that matters. The rest is up to you. Study the surroundings, look for clues. Define your path.

Simulation of the functioning of a real spaceship

A ship is not just a decoration or a place of action. It is a living organism that reacts to the events taking place in it. Have you turned off the power to the compartment for access to the locked room? Get ready to race with the expiring air. Or search for your cherished door. In the dark.

Different scenarios

Explore the ship, collect notes about the last moments of the life of the crew and find a way to get out of there.

Death is also a result

You can't lose. Even death leads to one of the endings, depending on the upcoming events. Any outcome is the final. Logical. Whole. Finished.
